Privacy and Cookie Policy

Source was founded in 2014 by Tom Jewell, a former professional cricketer for Surrey. Coming from a family deeply involved in property, Tom had a passion for property investment. His property journey started with helping other professional athletes who didn’t have the time or confidence to get started.

It was quite apparent busy sportsmen needed someone to bring together all the moving parts—sourcing the right properties, structuring finances, and managing everything efficiently.

Privacy and Cookie Policy

After helping fellow cricketer Chris Tremlett grow his property portfolio, Chris joined the company, sharing the same passion for property investment. Along with the companies Managing Director, Ollie Smith who brought a background in financial services.

In the same year Source launched, the company opened a nationwide lettings and management service. This allowed clients to invest in multiple locations while having one trusted point of contact.
